column4: I learned image minipulation on gimp and only recently had opportunity to try out photoshop and, well, didn't see it as being any better, at least not for any of the things I do. It appeared that I could work through projects faster with gimp.
Leave a working section alone, and only change section that does not work as you wish.
Ubuntu / Debian is very convenient that way.
